channel.title: Task 1: Initial Prompt :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Modify the provided initialPrompt() function to prompt the user to enter a word to score. Use the oldScrabbleScorer() function provided to score the word provided by the user. Print the result to the console. Before you move on, be sure youâ€™re on the right track. At this point, your program should have an output like this: $ node index Let's play some Scrabble! Enter a word to score: pineapple Points for 'P': 3 Points for 'I': 1 Points for 'N': 1 Points for 'E': 1 Points for 'A': 1 Points for 'P': 3 Points for 'P': 3 Points for 'L': 1 Points for 'E': 1
